summary: Virtual Studio paint-brush try-on feature tested successfully. Intensity controls (Light/Medium/Bold) confirmed removed. All 3 shade categories (Lipstick, Blush, Strobe) work correctly with exact color matching. Canvas painting, brush/eraser tools, undo, clear all, and before/after toggle all functioning properly.

design_issues.issue: Text still mentions 'intensity' but intensity controls have been removed

passed_tests: Intensity controls (Light/Medium/Bold) NOT visible - confirmed removed
Lipstick category loads with shade 'Red Earth Aura' (#8C3B32 / rgb(140,59,50))
Blush category loads with shade 'Soft Petal Deep' (#C97B84 / rgb(201,123,132))
Strobe Cream category loads with shade 'Golden Aura Glow' (#E8CDB5 / rgb(232,205,181))
Image upload works correctly via file chooser
Canvas drawing functionality works - strokes paint on overlay
Brush tool works - paints with selected shade color
Eraser tool works - removes painted strokes
Undo button works - reverts to previous canvas state
Clear All button works - removes all painted strokes
Before/After toggle works - shows/hides painted overlay
Swatch colors verified to match painted brush colors (opacity 1.0)

code_review_verification.getBrushColorRGBA: Returns opacity 1.0 for exact swatch color match
code_review_verification.drawSmoothLine: Gradient stops use exact swatch color (no intensity-based modifications)
code_review_verification.drawPoint: Same gradient stops as drawSmoothLine for consistency

action_items: Minor: Update 'How to use' text in VirtualStudioPage.jsx line 681 - remove reference to 'intensity'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Virtual Studio paint feature fully tested. All canvas drawing, tools, and color matching working correctly. Only minor text update needed.
